wobani.toolbox

Class Utility.ShadowMapMatrixSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.toolbox.Utility.ShadowMapMatrixSolver
  • Enclosing class:
    Utility

    private static class Utility.ShadowMapMatrixSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can compute the main directional light's projection view matrix for shadow mapping. It tries to compute the view matrix to best fit to the main camera's view frustum.

      • computeMatrix

        public static org.joml.Matrix4f computeMatrix(float distance,
                                              float nearDistance,
                                              float farDistance)
        Computes the main directional light's projection view matrix based on the given data.
        Parameters:
        distance - distance from the camera frustum center
        nearDistance - near plane distance
        farDistance - far plane distance
        Returns:
        the main directional light's projection view matrix
